message: I propose a 70/30 split in my favor. Let's avoid further inflation and settle this quickly.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the inflation we both face. Let's settle this now.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but the split needs to be more equitable. I'm proposing a 55/45 split. This reflects the greater impact inflation has on my share with each passing round.
